last_episode_to_air.name: Face to Face
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mónica and Daniel confront the orchestrator of Natalia's kidnapping. Urrutia makes a startling discovery. Alex fights for his daughter's life.

name: You Cannot Hide
overview: After discovering that her husband is involved with drug trafficking, and she decides to cooperate with the DEA, Lidia is forced to move to Spain with her teenage daughter, fleeing her tragic past to start a new life. Two years later, in Spain, Lidia's life enters chaos once more when someone is sent to kill her and her daughter is kidnapped.

episodes.name: On The Run
episodes.overview: A mother and her daughter flee Mexico and assume new identities in Madrid. The police investigate a gruesome murder. A terrorist attack occurs in Spain.

episodes.name: The Hint
episodes.overview: Mónica worries about Natalia's whereabouts, while her daughter tries to give her a clue that something is wrong. Daniel contemplates his job.

episodes.name: The Tattoo
episodes.overview: Eli confides in Humberto about why she's fighting with Natalia. Daniel turns to his former partner for help in finding Mónica's daughter.

episodes.name: Proof Of The Crime
episodes.overview: Alex becomes suspicious of Daniel's intentions. Mónica investigates on her own. Alberto attempts to calm Eli down about Natalia's disappearance.

episodes.name: In Danger
episodes.overview: Mónica gets into trouble while searching for answers about Natalia. Alberto worries about what Eli will do next.

episodes.name: The Truth
episodes.overview: Eli feels threatened. The detectives' line of questioning puts additional pressure on Alberto. Natalia meets more of her kidnappers.

episodes.name: A New Suspect
episodes.overview: A new suspect emerges in the murder of Beatriz Prats. Urrutia receives a yellow envelope containing shocking information. Hugo attempts to help Natalia.

episodes.name: Final Destination
episodes.overview: Mónica and Daniel discover where Natalia was sent. Urrutia struggles to believe the latest suspect in the Prats case.

episodes.name: Intuition
episodes.overview: Velasco grows suspicious of Urrutia after an incident involving Alex. Eli seeks solace with Humberto. Mónica and Daniel arrive in Mexico.

episodes.name: Face to Face
episodes.overview: Mónica and Daniel confront the orchestrator of Natalia's kidnapping. Urrutia makes a startling discovery. Alex fights for his daughter's life.
